alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:14AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN GULF AND WESTERN FRANKLIN COUNTIES THROUGH 245 AM EDT/145 AM CDT/... At 214 AM EDT/114 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Wewahitchka, or 15 miles northeast of Port St. Joe, moving southwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apalachicola, St George Island, Port St. Joe, Eastpoint, Eleven Mile, Odena, Cape San Blas, Indian Pass, Beverly, Milltown, Bay City, Willis Landing, Apalachicola Airport, Simmons Bayou, Dalkeith, Saint Joe Beach, Nine Mile, Buck Siding, Highland View, and St Joseph State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
